text: The 2011–12 Bill Beaumont Cup (Rugby Union County Championship) was the 112th edition of England's County Championship rugby union club competition. Hertfordshire won their first title after defeating Lancashire in the final. == Final == {| width="80%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |-
